## All the content is out there. We're just putting it together. {.unnumbered}

We collect all videos recorded from a show and re-creates the concerts from start to finish so you can enjoy it from your home.

With these simple steps you can contribute by uploading a video to our platform and we take care of the rest, then you can just enojoy the show.
